se.jguru.nazgul.tools.codestyle.enforcer.rules.source

Class JavaPackageExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.tools.codestyle.enforcer.rules.source.JavaPackageExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PackageExtractor

    public class JavaPackageExtractor
extends Object
implements PackageExtractor
    Java-flavoured PackageExtractor implementation, validating performance over complete (i.e. AST) correctness.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FileFilter JAVA_SOURCE_FILEFILTER
      FileFilter which identifies a normal Java source file.
      static Pattern PACKAGE_STATEMENT
      Regular expression to search for a package statement line.
      static String PACKAGE_WORD
      The 'package' reserved Java word.

      Retrieves the package definition from the supplied sourceFile.

    • Field Detail

      • PACKAGE_WORD

        public static final String PACKAGE_WORD
        The 'package' reserved Java word.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PACKAGE_STATEMENT

        public static final Pattern PACKAGE_STATEMENT
        Regular expression to search for a package statement line. Does not perform full Java AST construction of the source file given - instead preferring parsing speed.

      • JAVA_SOURCE_FILEFILTER

        public static final FileFilter JAVA_SOURCE_FILEFILTER
        FileFilter which identifies a normal Java source file.

        public String getPackage(File sourceFile)
        Retrieves the package definition from the supplied sourceFile.
        Specified by:
        getPackage in interface PackageExtractor
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - The sourceFile from which the package definition should be extracted.
        Returns:
        The package of the sourceFile.

      • getSourceFileFilter

        public FileFilter getSourceFileFilter()
        Retrieves a FileFilter which identifies the source files that can be handled by this PackageExtractor.
        Specified by:
        getSourceFileFilter in interface PackageExtractor
        Returns:
        a non-null FileFilter which identifies the source files that can be handled by this PackageExtractor.
